channel.title: [HD] RS DemonWars V2.5 508 [HD Custom] - Torva - Primal - Spirit Shields - [HD]
channel.description:
[size=23pt]RuneScape DemonWars v2.5[/size]
Is also online! I am holding a open beta this week, any one who would like to join go here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=84.28.216.223][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/84.28.216.223.png[/img][/url]
GET READY
My latest project.
Features: 1, clan wars (100%) 2, castle wars (90%) 3, god wars dungeon (85%) 4, Transformations: Kolodion - Graador - Kree'Ara - Zileyana - K'ril 5, bounty hunter 6, fist of guthix (Reaper's lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens} 7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS 8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it] 9, Grand Exchange! { yes now you can buy and sell all alone!) 10, Gods: all the Gods like Kree'Ara drop a special axe that fully transforms you into Kree'Ara, Graador drops a axe for Graador ect. 11, Gods and Demons are in a war (they attack each other) 12, New magic system: you can now cast spells at npcs and players with the normal magic books. 13, 1 server, 5 clients! (you can now use LD and HD in one server) 14, NEW HOME! (your home is now at Zanaris{ AKA lost city}) 15, REMOVED CUSTOMS: i have removed most of the customs like most of u wanted. 16, BETTER PVP: you can now PVP against NPC PLAYERS at LD and normal players at both LD and HD. 17, You can attack players while in GOD form. 18, A new secret has bin added to skilling, find it! 19, 24 skills! (all work) 20, You can spawn 2 sarjeant Grimspikes or 2 Black Demons who will fight each other 21, As usual when you die you go to the Grim Reaper. 22, Combat level raised to max: 208! 23, Max HP raised to: 200! 24, Max skill level raised to: 120! 25, easy GWD tele command (::gwd) 26, GE clerk at home 27, 7 shops at home 28, D claws at LD 29, Spirit Shields at LD 30, FULL LD AND HD 31, New ::starter 32, New ::home 33, New ::master 34, Better NPC VS NPC Sytem 35, Added over 25 NVSN Variables 36, Added 123 NPCS (total of 342) 37, Added 19 Extra shops 38, Better banking system (tabs stay when logout) 39, Fight pits 100% (made by Drowning) 40, Added 2 Prayer Books
41, [size=24pt]NPC MULTI BARRAGE!! (yes it works! 100%)[/size]
42, [size=26pt]Constitution (90% only need to figure out how to change the max displayed hp from 255 to 990)[/size]
[size=14pt]43, {508} HD CUSTOM CLIENT FULLSCREEN!!!![/size]
[size=14pt]44, Torva at HD and LD![/size]
[size=18pt]45, Added Custom NPC dialogue (meaning that if u talk 2 a npc you get atleast 3 topic options [/size]
[size=18pt]46, Dungeoneering will be added in the 2.5 version[/size]
[size=18pt]47, Max HP has bin raised to 999999999 at V2.5[/size]
Skills: Attack, Defence and strength= 100% Ranged= 90% Magic= 85% Magic vs player (ancients) = 90% Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells) Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 90% (need to add projectiles and sounds) Prayer= 100% Construction= 0% Decided to stop working on that. FireMaking= 100% [size=24pt]Crafting= 50%[/size]
///////Pictures\\\\\\\ - outdated
[size=12pt]NEW[/size] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/staffsshop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/photo2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/logosmall.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/levels.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/home.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/HD.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/HDCUSTOM.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/gesee.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/ge100.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/GE.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1008.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1007.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1006.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1005.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1004.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/dragonscape1003.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0025.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0024.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0023.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0022.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/Dragonscape0021.png[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/jimjhonson/photo1.jpg[/img]
[size=36pt]Pre-View Video:[/size] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EvFOgvgQZk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-EvFOgvgQZk[/url]
[size=36pt]///////Downloads\\\\\\\[/size]
Full Package:
[URL=http://up.ht/1ap6YXz]RSDW Package V2.5.rar - 190.8 MB[/URL]
This includes a x64 bit client for if you are running 64 bits and are getting the "Error_Game_DLL" error
Keep in mind that if you release a server that is based on this one and you don't have permission from me i will report it to a Moderator and the topic will be removed.
Developer And Owner: DemonWars
_-Credits-_ client(HD) : 70% Hotyute 29% noobs are ftw (for the fantastic explain about adding HD models) 1% me for all the work ;)
source: 35% Palidino76 base from Drowning508 - (I HAVE PERMISSION!) - Whom without i would not've be able to make this server . 65% Me
======== Grafics Versions ========
HD: High detail Resizeble, {has custom models} High detail Fullscreen, {has custom models!} High detail Fixed, {has Custom Models!}
LD: Low detail Resizeble, {has custom models} Low detail Fullscreen, {has custom models} Low detail Fixed, {has custom models}
=============================
[size=24pt]Common errors[/size] ----------------------------------- js5connect: There is something wrong with the way you connect both the server and client, my advice is to test the client with a other server and vice-versa (or update java, it might improve the connection) (this error should appear at: "connecting to update server" or "loading updates") ----------------------------------- Game_caps_vesa: Your video driver is out of date, try updating it (this error should appear at: "Loading 3D library") ----------------------------------- Error_game_dll (dont know the exact error): there either is a problem with the server or client, try using a other client with the server or a other server with the client. (this error should appear at the "Connecting" section) - If you are on a x64 PC you should run the x64 bit client. ---------------------------------- if the error contains: already in use: you are running a server at the same IP that you are trying to run this one, close the other one in order to run this one. ---------------------------------- Please report any other errors and ill be glad to help you with it.
==============================
READ THIS!!!!
THIS SERVER IS MADE BY: DEMONWARS
[size=36pt]MOST IMPORTANT!!!,[/size]
THIS SERVER IS NOT LEECHED IN ANY WAY!
I DO HAVE PERMISSION FOR THE DROWNING PALI BASE FROM DUHPK!
[size=36pt][shadow=red,left]Read Readme files in server folders[/shadow][/size]

item.title: [HD] RS DemonWars V2.5 508 [HD Custom] - Torva - Primal - Spirit Shields - [HD]
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[size=24pt]FIRST:[/size]
I will reupload RSDW 2.5 on the 11th of August (tomorrow)

malimt:

>Why is everyone bringing old topics back up… If they haven’t updated anything within the past year or two, that means they DO NOT CARE. <

[center]
[size=18pt]I do care.[/size]

As a quick explanation to my lack of updates.
I was 15 when i first started, 16 when i released 2.5.
I have my own life to get on the road and though i enjoy coding, i don’t have alot of time for it these days.

But i’m teaming up with a old friend of these forums to make a final (hopefully) amazing project.
I can’t give out to many details, but we have amazing ideas.

Though he’s busy with other projects as well, and my school starts in a month, we both are dedicated to make one last great project

As you can imagine this might take ALOT of time, but when we have something significant to show for, we will.

I will be making a post under Server development this month, detailing who we are, why we do this, and what we’ve done so far.

I hope this will make all of you feel a bit better!
[size=18pt]
As always:
King’s regards:
DemonWars[/size]

[/center]
[size=24pt]Link to RSDW 2.5[/size]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


This is the project of Tehjamdude, he used my full source, we worked on it before so.

Read full topic
